subject: PRODUCT TECHNICAL SUPPORT TEAM -
description_text:
Simsonn,

Your products are now getting quite popular!
We are now manufacturing quite a few products to support your customers.

I'm reaching out to you today to request assistance - The schematics you
have online don't detail the missing measurement we require to finalise the
part for our customer using your Pressure Handbrake.

Please see the attached file guys.
Can you provide me the missing measure - What is the distance, centre to
centre of the mounting slots,  in millimeters.

Much appreciated.

Warmest regards,

Mark @ Lowdown Shifter

.

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Fryer,  I measured the center-to-center hole spacing and it is 61 mm.

Hi,

Thank you for this. Much appreciated.

We can now manufacture the product.

Keep doing great things!

Speak soon.

Warmest regards,

Mark @ Lowdown Shifter

.



On Wed, Jan 14, 2026 at 1:17 AM service@simsonn.com
